member.name: D3D12_MESH_SHADER_TIER
member.summary: Defines constants that specify mesh and amplification shader support.

member.name: D3D12_MESH_SHADER_TIER.D3D12_MESH_SHADER_TIER_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: Specifies that mesh and amplification shaders are not supported.

member.name: D3D12_MESH_SHADER_TIER.D3D12_MESH_SHADER_TIER_1
member.summary: Specifies that mesh and amplification shaders are supported.
